video.title: Emergency!
video.synopsis: Big city paramedics see more than their share of action as they race the clock and risk life and limb to help patients in medical emergencies.

episodes.synopsis: The new LACFD paramedics struggle to prove themselves to a doubtful Dr. Brackett as a pending state bill authorizing their field duties comes to a vote.
episodes.title: The Wedsworth-Townsend Act: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The new LACFD paramedics struggle to prove themselves to a doubtful Dr. Brackett as a pending state bill authorizing their field duties comes to a vote.
episodes.title: The Wedsworth-Townsend Act: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Brackett puts his reputation on the line when he sees signs of a botulism outbreak in the symptoms of a patient who was brought to the hospital straight from a movie set. Meanwhile, John plots his revenge against his mischievous co-workers.
episodes.title: Botulism

episodes.synopsis: John delivers a cyanotic baby despite the wishes of the infant's father, who would rather wait for his own doctor. Elsewhere, Roy gets a complex about his cooking after some firemen give him a hard time, and a man gets stranded in a crane.
episodes.title: Cook's Tour

episodes.synopsis: Station 51 is called up to fight a wildfire. John and Roy rescue an elderly woman and her sister, treat an injured fireman, deliver a baby, catch a looter, and find a boy's lost dog.
episodes.title: Brushfire

episodes.synopsis: When his pilot father has a heart attack, a young boy must put his trust in Roy, who calmly instructs him how to land the plane on his own. John, on the other hand, is so fed up with losing at cards that he's inspired to invent a new game.
episodes.title: Dealer's Wild

episodes.synopsis: A feisty nurse puts John on the defensive, and Dr. Early treats an alcoholic. Elsewhere in the city, an injured chemical-plant employee is trapped at work, and a storeowner is racked with guilt after shooting an armed robber.
episodes.title: Nurse's Wild

episodes.synopsis: John, already sick with envy over a wave of publicity that's befallen a fellow paramedic, adds to his misery by helping John rescue a man from a ship and getting seasick. Back at the ER, Dr. Brackett goes head to head with high-maintenance parent.
episodes.title: Publicity Hound

episodes.synopsis: The superstitious John gets a hunch that strange things will happen during his shift. His premonition proves correct when a parachutist lands in a tree and a woman predicts her own appendicitis. William Katt guest stars.
episodes.title: Weird Wednesday

episodes.synopsis: A packed elevator gets stuck and then plummets to the ground, causing one passenger to have a heart attack while another breaks his leg. All the while, a young nursing student is going gaga for Dr. Brackett. Seymour Cassel guest stars.
episodes.title: Dilemma

episodes.synopsis: A whiny burglar gets caught in an air conditioning duct, causing John to miss the end of a nail-biting "Adam-12" episode. Dr. Brackett treats a woman's migraine headaches, and a surfer ruins his cast after hitting the waves. Mort Sahl guest stars.
episodes.title: Hang-up

episodes.synopsis: A plane crash, a heart-attack victim and a poisoned child keep the team on high alert. John feels bad about calling Roy a nut, and Cicely Tyson guest stars as the mother of a young football player who was downed by a tough tackle.
episodes.title: Crash

episodes.synopsis: When a mechanic is crushed under an engine, John and Roy skirt the rules and attempt a risky surgery. The results prove tragic, and a devastated Roy considers another career. But he gets a shot at redemption when he spots a child trapped in a fire.
episodes.title: Problem

episodes.synopsis: When the firemen save a helpless boy from the bottom of a deep hole, Dr. Brackett. diagnoses child abuse. In an effort to keep the kid from further harm, Brackett puts himself through legal hell. John Travolta guest stars as a hiker in peril.
episodes.title: Kids

episodes.synopsis: John goes Hollywood when he's discovered and booked to model for a sexy photo shoot starring hunky firemen. But the shoot is forced to "take five" when the heroes rush to a studio backlot to rescue a pair of stuntmen.
episodes.title: Show Biz

episodes.synopsis: A deadly virus spreads across Rampart Hospital and infects John and Dr. Brackett. As John and Brackett struggle to survive, the Rampart team struggles to rescue an injured man from a scaffold hanging high above the city.
episodes.title: Virus

episodes.synopsis: When a construction worker is shot at a work site, the Rampart paramedics speed to the scene. Once there, the rescue workers find themselves under fire by a psychotic sniper who will stop at nothing to make certain no one leaves.
episodes.title: Peace Pipe

episodes.synopsis: With a nun and a helpless bus full of children teetering on the edge of an immense cliff, it's up to Station 51 to save the day. Later, John risks his life to make some extra money when he moonlights as a rodeo cowboy.
episodes.title: Saddled

episodes.synopsis: When firehouses all across the city fall victim to an elusive robber, the LAPD assigns Sheila Thomas, a sexy undercover cop played by Sharon Gless of "Cagney & Lacey," to crack the case. Much to John's surprise, Sheila also steals his heart.
episodes.title: Fuzz Lady

episodes.synopsis: A Vietnam War medic joins the staff as a paramedic trainee. But his overinflated ego clashes with his co-workers when he accompanies them on emergency calls to treat a drug overdose, a diabetic in distress and an injured boy at the bottom of a cliff.
episodes.title: Trainee

episodes.synopsis: Leslie Charleson guest stars as a journalist who drives the rescue workers nuts when she shadows them at work. The day only gets worse when the guys have to save a trucker trapped under power lines, a poisoned child and a guy stuck in a sofa bed.
episodes.title: Women

episodes.synopsis: Playing Cupid, Roy fixes a nervous John up with Roy's wife's cousin. But love isn't in the air when an insanely protective father shoots his daughter's husband for eloping and impregnating her without papa's permission. Melissa Gilbert guest stars.
episodes.title: Dinner Date

episodes.synopsis: Time is of the essence when the paramedics diagnose a child with lead poisoning in a remote area. But tensions soar when the boy's paranoid and reclusive father refuses to allow the paramedics to administer urgent medical care.
episodes.title: Musical Mania

episodes.synopsis: None of the Rampart staff can figure out the reason behind Dr. Varner's unusually odd behavior around the hospital. So when Varner's actions escalate from odd to dangerous, her co-workers are forced to confront her. Jamie Farr guest stars.
episodes.title: Helpful

episodes.synopsis: Plagued by rude and downright dangerous motorists, John comes close to going postal. But Roy suspects that John's anger might have something to do with the recent death of his mentor, a former paramedic instructor.
episodes.title: Drivers

episodes.synopsis: Billy, an insecure paramedic trainee, is getting under everyone's skin. But when a man is trapped in a wrecked ambulance, it's up to Billy to save the day. Across town, Squad 51 responds to a frantic call over a practical joke gone horribly wrong.
episodes.title: School Days

episodes.synopsis: Conspiracy theories fly around the hospital when the CIA keeps tabs on a mental patient who has been diagnosed with schizophrenia. John is equally vexed by Roy, who's suddenly more popular and adored than he is.
episodes.title: The Professor

episodes.synopsis: A string of bad luck lands the heroes in their own sickbeds. Roy comes down with tonsillitis; Chet ends up in traction; Dr. Brackett is nailed by falling rubble; and Boot the firedog undergoes surgery for tick removal.
episodes.title: Syndrome

episodes.synopsis: When a seemingly innocent fib results in a dangerous explosion, the incident inspires John to swear off telling white lies for the rest of his life. But always telling the truth to his co-workers, friends and family proves much easier said than done.
episodes.title: Honest

episodes.synopsis: A bizarre woman ties up the city's emergency operators with dozens of frantic calls begging for protection from a ghost. The crazed caller claims the furious spirit of her late sister is determined to harm her husband. Bruno Kirby guest stars.
episodes.title: Seance

episodes.synopsis: When a fiery explosion rocks Rampart hospital, employees and patients are rushed to safety. But the fate of irreplaceable hospital documents is anyone's guess. Back at the firehouse, everyone is concerned over Boot the firehouse dog's lack of energy.
episodes.title: Boot

episodes.synopsis: A paranoid patient wrongly accuses John and Roy of picking his pockets while he was in their medical care. To clear their good names, John and Roy set out to solve the crime, catch the culprit and return the stolen money. Jo Anne Worley guest-stars.
episodes.title: Rip-Off

episodes.synopsis: Roy is faced with a choice that every paramedic fears: Should he amputate a trapped man's healthy leg, or wait until he's freed and risk having an entire building collapse on both of them? Back at the station, a hilarious con artist shows up.
episodes.title: Audit

episodes.synopsis: John urgently needs help for an injured friend but finds the radio frequency occupied by another paramedic squad. Meanwhile, casualties stretch the emergency room to capacity in the aftermath of a motorcycle gang war.
episodes.title: Frequency

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy buy an old-fashioned fire engine for Station 51. Despite the new equipment, it's business as usual for the paramedics as they deal with an LSD-crazed woman, a burning building with a trapped fireman, and a politician in cardiac arrest.
episodes.title: The Old Engine

episodes.synopsis: A stray cat creates a home for her kittens on John's bunk inside Station 51. Elsewhere, an old man falls into his own bear trap; a family is stuck inside a burning airplane; and a gas leak springs in an elementary school.
episodes.title: Alley Cat

episodes.synopsis: Jason Channing, a visiting British paramedic, joins Roy and John on the road to witness American rescue workers in action. The day includes stops to rescue a man trapped in industrial equipment, and an unconscious policeman in a burning elevator.
episodes.title: An English Visitor

episodes.synopsis: A heavily armed young man wants revenge after his father is stabbed. The paramedics urge restraint, but vigilante justice might be in the offing. Meantime, a new mother tries to abandon her deformed child, and John begins a fitness regimen.
episodes.title: Heavyweight

episodes.synopsis: On the way back from a fishing trip, John, Roy and Chet encounter a car accident and stop to help the victims on the scene. Later, John assists some folks who drove off a cliff, but he's bitten by a rattlesnake for his troubles.
episodes.title: Snakebite

episodes.synopsis: Roy passes his engineer's test but will have to leave the paramedics if he takes the promotion. Meanwhile, on the San Diego freeway, dozens of motorists plow into each other during severe fog, creating a huge pileup.
episodes.title: The Promotion

episodes.synopsis: With John suffering from insomnia, it's a busy night all around. The doctors are stymied by the illness of a marijuana smoker; a man and his son are hurt when they try to avoid running over a dog; and a man is trapped against a wall by a semi.
episodes.title: Insomnia

episodes.synopsis: Roy and John come into some unexpected wealth when a former patient remembers them in her will. They also deal with a child trapped inside a car covered in power lines, and a teenager who overexerted himself at a hamburger eating contest.
episodes.title: Inheritance Tax

episodes.synopsis: John experiences paralyzing stage fright on a live television program, but Roy is there to pick up his slack. Elsewhere, a man gets stuck in a doughnut machine, a young boy is dangerously suicidal and a woman promotes scream therapy.
episodes.title: Zero

episodes.synopsis: John receives a puppy from a woman whose dog he cared for earlier, and Roy chides a woman who calls the paramedics just to ease her loneliness. Meanwhile, a mechanic found at a vehicle fire remains unresponsive.
episodes.title: Promise

episodes.synopsis: A pilot crash-lands his crop duster, puncturing his lung and poisoning a bystander with pesticides. Elsewhere, mothballs cause an ear infection, daffodil bulbs cause an overdose, and John accidentally proposes to his girlfriend.
episodes.title: Body Language

episodes.synopsis: During a bank robbery, a hostage has a heart attack, and the paramedics are called in to assist -- with guns pointed at them from start to finish. Later, the hospital tries to trace a call from an anonymous woman who threatens to commit suicide.
episodes.title: Understanding

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy rescue a woman from a well, a magician from a safe, a young couple from a wrecked vehicle and a junkyard owner from a fire. John also deals with credit card problems stemming from a computer glitch.
episodes.title: Computer Error

episodes.synopsis: Roy and John feel excluded when they aren't called to help at a large fire and head to the scene anyway, only to become trapped while rescuing a fireman. Meanwhile, a lawyer has a heart attack, and Dixie gets her hand stuck in a vending machine.
episodes.title: Inferno

episodes.synopsis: Tired of being the butt of Chet's practical jokes, John plans his revenge. Elsewhere, a boy gets trapped in his tree house, and an old man who likes to fake illnesses so he can amuse kids at the hospital experiences a real emergency.
episodes.title: Messin' Around

episodes.synopsis: Donaldson, an arrogant young intern with nothing but disdain for the paramedics, makes a grievous error in diagnosis and almost kills a patient. To straighten him out, Dr. Brackett sends him on a ride-along with Squad 51.
episodes.title: Fools

episodes.synopsis: Religious zealots won't let the hospital treat their daughter; a man has trouble breathing; and another man needs a live grenade removed from his abdomen. Meanwhile, Roy waters plants for a woman who isn't what she seems.
episodes.title: How Green Was My Thumb?

episodes.synopsis: Roles are reversed as Dr. Early becomes a patient in need of open-heart surgery. The paramedics also help a woman who needs to have her toe removed from a bathtub faucet, and a boy who gets trapped inside his custom-built rocket ship.
episodes.title: The Hard Hours

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy decide it would be a good idea to start their own floor cleaning business to make some extra money. Elsewhere, a chemist is knocked unconscious when his lab goes up in flames, and a hermit is trapped inside his cave dwelling.
episodes.title: Floor Brigade

episodes.synopsis: While his home is being fumigated, Roy stays over at John's house, which turns out to be a rather memorable experience. Later, they meet a poker fan who won't leave his game unless one of them plays out his hand -- despite being mid-coronary.
episodes.title: Propinquity

episodes.synopsis: A screenwriter rides along with Squad 51 to observe John and Roy in action. During the day, the paramedics rush to a burning toy factory, an emergency birth, and a scene of mayhem where a worker raves violently after being exposed to toxic fumes.
episodes.title: The Screenwriter

episodes.synopsis: John and Chet demonstrate their mechanical skills when they're recruited to repair a bicycle. Later, an oil well erupts and traps a man underneath his own house, and the firemen free a frightened child trapped in a pipe.
episodes.title: I'll Fix It

episodes.synopsis: Roy encourages John to participate in the Fireman's Olympics track meet. Elsewhere, Nurse Ridgely spreads malicious gossip about Dr. Morton's financial situation, and a man with too many wives suffers a fracture.
episodes.title: Gossip

episodes.synopsis: John is determined to figure out Roy's technique for picking winning horses. In the meantime, the squad is called to action when a woman falls into a lion enclosure at the zoo; a skateboarder falls into a cactus; and a policeman is shot by a sniper.
episodes.title: Nagging Suspicion

episodes.synopsis: When both a policeman and a criminal are shot, Squad 51 responds to the call. But the policeman's partner criticizes the paramedics for treating the bad guy. Later, Roy spends some time away from work to join his wife on a television game show.
episodes.title: Communication Gaffe

episodes.synopsis: Dixie sprains her ankle, possibly derailing the surprise party the doctors and paramedics plan to throw her. Outside the ER, the paramedics rescue two workers who are about to be crushed by a half-ton sign.
episodes.title: Surprise

episodes.synopsis: New nurse Daisy turns heads at Rampart Hospital, including John's -- but he has plenty of competition for her attention. Elsewhere, a refrigerator repairman literally freezes on the job, and a man gets both of his hands glued to a model ship.
episodes.title: Daisy's Pick

episodes.synopsis: Station 51 gets revenge on Chet when they get sick of his practical jokes. Meanwhile, a pregnant woman shoots herself, and a man injured during a motorcycle accident develops a new form of communication. Olympic athlete Mark Spitz guest stars.
episodes.title: Quicker Than the Eye

episodes.synopsis: Basketball legend Kareem Abdul-Jabbar guest stars as a man who's too tall to be removed from his wrecked vehicle. Back at the hospital, Dixie finds her workload overflowing thanks to a series of drastic budget cuts.
episodes.title: Foreign Trade

episodes.synopsis: The paramedics witness a hit-and-run while responding to another emergency, and John develops feelings for the beautiful and mysterious victim. Others need help when a child bites a dog who responds in kind, and a dancer eats too many diet pills.
episodes.title: Details

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy proudly trot out their revamped vintage engine just in time for the California Firefighters' Parade. But problems arise when a man with a serious heart condition insists on getting behind the wheel.
episodes.title: Parade

episodes.synopsis: One of John's old high school classmates joins Squad 51 as a paramedic in training. Over the course of a busy day, he observes the squad's fast-paced responses to a snakebite; a hydrogen sulfide explosion; and a trapped heart attack victim.
episodes.title: Transition

episodes.synopsis: Captain Stanley goes on vacation, leaving Station 51 in the hands of veteran firefighter Captain Robertson. But tempers flare when Robertson tells John and Roy that he thinks the paramedic program is a waste of time.
episodes.title: Smoke Eater

episodes.synopsis: John leads a school tour for a group of kids through Rampart Hospital, but the kids' questioning natures might prove too much for him. While on the field, the paramedics also engage a hallucinating Army veteran who's holding his wife at knifepoint.
episodes.title: Kidding

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Brackett's father shows up at Rampart Hospital in need of treatment for phlebitis. In the meantime, the paramedics respond to calls involving a power transformer that flies into a man's bedroom and a man who gets trapped in a trunk.
episodes.title: Prestidigitation

episodes.synopsis: During a friendly game of baseball with a rival squad, John proposes that the losers pony up the cash for the firemen's picnic. But it doesn't look good for Squad 51 when their pitcher breaks his arm. Can Chet deliver the goods in a pinch?
episodes.title: It's How You Play the Game

episodes.synopsis: When a jet crashes into an apartment building, Squad 51 speeds to the rescue; elsewhere, a man's multiple heart attacks cause concern. While his colleagues handle big jobs, Chet spends his time trying to capture a mouse that's loose in the station.
episodes.title: The Mouse

episodes.synopsis: A lonely man pretends to have a back injury just to get attention, and a man hurts himself when he kicks in his television. Meanwhile, John is angry that genuine victims are shoved to the back burner by frivolous requests for emergency aid.
episodes.title: Back-Up

episodes.synopsis: John tracks a mysterious blood trail to the back of a grocery store and comes face-to-face with a Bengal tiger. After taking care of the dangerous beast, Animal Control sticks around to help put out a brush fire that threatens the lives of many pets.
episodes.title: 905-Wild

episodes.synopsis: John gets a chance to impress a lovely stewardess when a passenger on his flight has a heart attack and requires emergency aid. On the ground, the paramedics respond to a critical call involving a chemical fire.
episodes.title: The Stewardess

episodes.synopsis: While John and Roy wait to hear whether a buyer is interested in a vintage fire engine they refurbished, Squad 51 rescues a man who fell off a cliff in Catalina Island. Back at the hospital, a mother pesters Dr. Morton to fill out a prescription.
episodes.title: The Old Engine Cram

episodes.synopsis: The plaster cast a sculptress is using on one of her models dries much too quickly and traps the model inside. The bizarre accident would be business as usual for Squad 51 -- except that John and Roy are also up for election to a welfare committee.
episodes.title: Election

episodes.synopsis: John puts in overtime at Squad 8 but discovers that the fire captain doesn't have enough equipment, making it impossible to reach every victim in need. Back at Squad 51, Roy responds to an emergency in a fireworks factory.
episodes.title: Equipment

episodes.synopsis: The wife of a man who received a heart transplant is convinced he doesn't love her anymore. Elsewhere, a parachutist misjudges his landing and ends up hanging from a radio tower, and Squad 51 prepares for a visit from the battalion chief.
episodes.title: The Inspection

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy meet a paramedic trainee with a chip on her shoulder, much to their distaste. Later on, a suicidal man attempts to kill himself using gas but changes his mind halfway through the procedure.
episodes.title: The Indirect Method

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy head out to Catalina Island to assist a scuba diver who gets the bends and needs to be decompressed in a hyperbaric chamber. Another situation involves a raging fire in a kitchen run by a famous chef.
episodes.title: Pressure 165

episodes.synopsis: An old crossing guard accuses John and Roy of hitting him, prompting police to investigate the accusation. But there are other car accidents that day involving a couple who hit a fire hydrant and an overturned truck that spilled insecticide.
episodes.title: The Lighter-Than-Air Man

episodes.synopsis: The paramedics respond to an emergency call that leads them to a puzzling scene with two wrecked vehicles but no drivers. They also help a man who slips in the bathtub; a child trapped by a fire; and a drunk.
episodes.title: One of Those Days

episodes.synopsis: John and Chet demolish Station 51's television. But the paramedics' busy day also involves visiting a man who glued his eyes closed by mistake and rescuing victims of a gas explosion. Back at the hospital, Dr. Brackett is swamped.
episodes.title: Tee Vee

episodes.synopsis: A filmmaking team composed of a television news journalist and a cameraman who served in Vietnam shoots documentary footage of John and Roy on the job. The lens follows Squad 51 on missions to help a stuntman and a man pinned below a fuel truck.
episodes.title: On Camera

episodes.synopsis: Communications break down between Squad 51 and Rampart Hospital, leading to crossed signals. In addition to technical problems, the paramedics face a suicidal woman who doesn't want their help, and a man with an arm caught in machinery.
episodes.title: Communications

episodes.synopsis: Roy thinks about buying a house but has trouble making a firm decision -- and John's constant stream of unsolicited home-purchasing advice only makes matters worse. While on duty, the paramedics encounter a pair of inexperienced drivers.
episodes.title: To Buy or Not to Buy

episodes.synopsis: When the paramedics rescue a father and son trapped in a canyon while camping, Roy opens his home to the child, leading to unexpected consequences. Elsewhere, Dr. Early treats a patient with spinal meningitis.
episodes.title: Right at Home

episodes.synopsis: The former head nurse of the Rampart emergency department returns to the workplace as a patient. During her recuperation, she forms a bond with a paraplegic teenager who was rescued from drowning in a swimming pool.
episodes.title: Involvement

episodes.synopsis: While conducting a fire inspection, John and Roy rescue a scuba diver from a fish tank. Meanwhile, Captain Stanley is nearly electrocuted while working near a downed power line, and Chet is obsessed with a nutritionist.
episodes.title: The Great Crash Diet

episodes.synopsis: John wants to use a hot dog stand near the station to get rich. But his dreams of becoming a fast food tycoon hinge on Roy's willingness to participate in his entrepreneurial scheme. Elsewhere, a lawn mower injures its owner.
episodes.title: The Tycoons

episodes.synopsis: No one ever said being a paramedic in Los Angeles was easy. But when a foolish law prevents John and Roy from driving outside their zone, the two find it nearly impossible to provide prompt emergency care to those who need it most.
episodes.title: Not Available

episodes.synopsis: A homeless man is trapped in a burning building, and John and Roy rescue him in the nick of time. Even though he doesn't appear to have a penny to his name, the grateful man presents the guys with a gift they never could have expected.
episodes.title: The Unlikely Heirs

episodes.synopsis: Roy is gearing up for a much-needed vacation, and everyone has suggestions for where he should go. But Roy's holiday and health could be in jeopardy when he gets lightheaded during a fire at a singles' club. Linda Gray guest stars.
episodes.title: That Time of Year

episodes.synopsis: John goes underground when two workers are seriously injured in a tunnel. In the midst of the rescue, a cave-in traps John in the tunnel, too. Now, it's a race against time as Roy tries to save John and the injured men before their oxygen runs out.
episodes.title: Fair Fight

episodes.synopsis: Roy and John are thrilled when they are invited to join the paramedic advisory committee. But their excitement quickly fades when they're forced to deal with Craig Brice, an annoying paramedic and fellow committee member.
episodes.title: Rules of Order

episodes.synopsis: The widow of a firefighter constantly calls for help with matters that aren't emergencies to anyone but her. But when the woman's daughter is injured in a bad fall, the rescue workers quickly realize that she has a real emergency on her hands.
episodes.title: The Exam

episodes.synopsis: The strict and unpopular Capt. Hookrader is on the verge of retirement, and the guys can't wait to see him go. The firefighters plan an elaborate farewell dinner that's actually a celebration of the captain's imminent departure.
episodes.title: Captain Hook

episodes.synopsis: Firefighters usually get modest paychecks, but a computer error leaves John rolling in the dough. Meanwhile, two workers are trapped on a scaffold, a homeless man is injured in a junkyard, and a victim's vicious dog complicates a rescue attempt.
episodes.title: Computer Terror

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy take some time off to go fishing in tranquil Santa Rosa County. Unfortunately, the guys' much-needed relaxation time comes to an end when they must drop their rods and scale the face of a dangerous cliff to save two unlucky climbers.
episodes.title: Welcome to Santa Rosa County

episodes.synopsis: The paramedics treat a janitor who helped himself to an old bottle of wine belonging to an archeologist. Unfortunately, the wine is so old that it dates back to the Mesopotamian Era, and may pack a lethal punch for the unlucky custodian.
episodes.title: Paper Work

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Brackett gets into a car accident that results in the death of the other driver. Brackett is devastated and blames himself for the fatality. But only the dead driver's daughter, who refuses to speak, knows the true cause of the crash.
episodes.title: Loose Ends

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy appear on television to discuss fire prevention and wind up in the midst of an on-camera medical emergency. Meanwhile, rescue workers attempt to scale a stalled Ferris wheel to save a heart-attack victim.
episodes.title: An Ounce of Prevention

episodes.synopsis: Paranoia takes over when Capt. Stanley learns that the strict battalion commander is scheduled to make an inspection. Two clowns start a fight at an ice-skating rink, and a woman accidentally wounds her husband with a nail gun.
episodes.title: Insanity Epidemic

episodes.synopsis: A nature-loving couple's overgrown shrubs are a serious fire hazard, but burning bushes are the least of their worries when rescue workers discover anthrax. Meanwhile, John and Roy attempt to fix an electrical short in the squad's rescue vehicle.
episodes.title: Breakdown

episodes.synopsis: The squad's sympathy goes out to Roy, who's dreading an upcoming visit from his crabby mother-in-law. Meanwhile, a fire at Rampart Hospital sends a patient into cardiac arrest, and an elderly man drinks a home remedy that poisons him.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: Vince sustains a head injury in a car accident and starts exhibiting bizarre behavior, culminating in an intense confrontation with John. Dr. Morton's refusal to deviate from hospital procedure leads the paramedics to question his judgment.
episodes.title: Bottom Line

episodes.synopsis: The firefighters pool their resources to purchase a sleek jet boat from Charlie, the firehouse mechanic. Meanwhile, off the coast of Catalina Island, the paramedics brave rough seas to rescue a pair of helpless boaters from a watery grave.
episodes.title: The Boat

episodes.synopsis: John and Roy are stranded in a small town when a torrential rainstorm washes out roads and bridges and downs power lines. With the help of a local doctor, they scramble to answer every emergency call they can until more help arrives.
episodes.title: Isolation

episodes.synopsis: Capt. Stanley has an important exam coming up, and worries that the chief is out to sabotage his efforts to move up in the ranks. Back at the hospital, John and Roy are trapped in an elevator with a man who suffers from heart problems.
episodes.title: Upward and Onward

episodes.synopsis: The doctors try to stave off infection in a woman suffering from a botched plastic surgery procedure. Back at the firehouse, Capt. Stanley tries to work through severe arm pain, until Roy and John convince him to get medical help.
episodes.title: Hypochondri-Cap

episodes.synopsis: John and the rest of squad are annoyed when the press follows Craig on a series of rescue calls, praising his heroism. John's day goes from bad to worse when he and Roy have to save their spotlight-hogging colleague from a burning building.
episodes.title: Limelight
